TopicTitle: How to activate engine reverse thrust?

Articles.Content:
Hi, how to activate the "reverse thrust" mode of an engine?

Thanks!

after some deep investigation, I've concluded that there's no clues given in the engine cfg file, but the only thing I can suggest is to investigate the engine's animation modules for the reverse thrust animation, it's possible that the thrust transform (the point and direction of thrust) reverses when the reverse animation is played thus causing the thrust to reverse direction.

so you'll have to experiment a little and see if you can force the reverse thrust animation to play and see if that helps.
@Xyphos Thanks, I'll try it later.
Yes, those engines have a ModuleAnimateGeneric module and it has a Toggle() call that should do the trick
